sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Users, Settings, BarChart3, LogOut, Bell, Search, Menu, X, UserCheck, ShoppingCart, TrendingUp, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; export default function Admin() { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); const [user] = useState({ name: 'Admin User', email: 'admin@example.com' }); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalUsers: 1250, activeUsers: 892, totalOrders: 3456, revenue: 125000 }); // Simulate data fetching from Ballerina backend useEffect(() => { // This would be your actual API call to Ballerina backend // fetch('/api/admin/stats') // .then(response => response.json()) // .then(data => setStats(data)); }, []); const handleLogout = () => { // This would call your Ballerina logout endpoint // fetch('/api/auth/logout', { method: 'POST' }) // .then(() => window.location.href = '/login'); // For demo purposes, just show alert alert('Logout clicked! This would redirect to login page.'); }; const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon: Icon, bgColor, iconColor }) => (

{title}

{value.toLocaleString()}

); const Sidebar = () => (

Admin Panel

); const DashboardContent = () => (

Recent Activities

New user registered

2 minutes ago

Order #1234 completed

15 minutes ago

User profile updated

1 hour ago

System Status

Database
Online
API Server
Running
Ballerina Backend
Healthy
); const UsersContent = () => (

User Management

Name Email Status Joined
Kasun Perera kasun@gmail.com Active 2024-01-15
Nimal Silva nimal@gmail.com Active 2024-02-20
Sunil Fernando sunil@gmail.com Inactive 2024-03-10
); const OrdersContent = () => (

Recent Orders

LKR 15,000

Completed

Nimal Silva • nimal@gmail.com

LKR 8,500

Processing
); const SettingsContent = () => (

System Settings

Email Notifications

Send notifications to admin email

Auto Backup

Automatically backup data daily

); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'dashboard': return ; case 'users': return ; case 'orders': return ; case 'settings': return ; default: return ; } }; return (
{/* Sidebar */} {/* Mobile sidebar overlay */} {sidebarOpen && (
setSidebarOpen(false)} /> )} {/* Main content */}
{/* Header */}

{user.name}

{user.email}

A
{/* Main content area */}

{activeTab.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + activeTab.slice(1)}

Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your system.

{renderContent()}
); }
